nodes.text: Gharj was a monstrous Sithspawn-like creature that had been created by the Rakata of the Infinite Empire through Force alchemy. During the era of the Empire, it was unleashed upon numerous worlds; the warlord Soa claimed that Gharj's claws had carved the canals of the planet Seylott, and Gharj's attacks on the Talz of Alzoc III led the Talz to worship the Rakata. It was imprisoned along with Soa and his forces in the Eternity Vault on the planet Belsavis, and was slain when the Vault was breached during the Galactic War and Soa attempted to break free.
Gharj is the second boss in the Eternity Vault operation featured in the 2011 LucasArts and BioWare massively multiplayer onnline roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
